site_name: Land Beneath And Bounded By Westway AndWest London Railway Line And Adjoining58 Wood LaneLondon  W12
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-Material Amendment ('NMA') Application to Outline Planning Permission (ref. 2018/00267/OUT) dated 28 April 2021 for: "A mixed use development delivered as a phased masterplan comprising 7 development zones and accommodating up to 178,102 sqm of research & development, offices and other business uses (Use Class B1) in 6 - 13 storey buildings; up to 373 residential units (Use Class C3) in 18 - 32 storey buildings; a hotel up to 8 storeys and associated facilities (Use Class C1); community and/or leisure uses and retail, cafes, restaurants and bars (Use Classes D1 and/or D2, A1-5) together with access, bridge over the railway (Central Line), parking, servicing and landscaping; and the demolition of Stadium House".The proposed amendments submitted as part of the NMA Application are to amend the description of the development: to remove specific use class references, revise the description of use classes and remove specific floor area figures. Amend description to "Outline planning application for a mixed use development delivered as a phased masterplan comprising 7 development zones accommodating research & development, offices and other business uses in 6 - 13 storey buildings; up to 373 residential units in 18 - 32 storey buildings; a hotel up to 8 storeys and associated facilities; non-residential institution use; community and/or leisure uses and retail, cafes, restaurants and bars together with access, bridge over the railway (Central Line), parking, servicing and landscaping; and the demolition of Stadium House."
